abstract: San Antonio Independent School District fires officer Joshua Kehm after video of him slamming 12-year-old middle school student Janissa Valdez face-first into sidewalk reveals discrepancies with official report he filed on incident.

headline.print_headline: Officer Who Slammed Girl to Ground Is Fired in Texas
headline.main: Texas Officer, Caught on Video Throwing Girl to the Ground, Is Fired

snippet: Officials at the San Antonio middle school said the officer’s report of subduing the 12-year-old girl was inconsistent with the cellphone video.
lead_paragraph: Officials at the San Antonio middle school said the officer’s report of subduing the 12-year-old girl was inconsistent with the cellphone video.
